Posts.Content: I have been on aromasin for 3 years, tamoxifem for 2 1/2 years. I have  trouble sleeping  without taking something to put me to sleep., also lots of vaginal dryness i have tried all kinds of lubricants, does anyone else have this problem?  In Jan 2002I had stage 3 with 14 positive lymphnodes with left mastectomy high dose chemo & radiation, but I am still here thank god. Any input would be appreciated, thanks, Nancy B
Posts.Title: aromasin

Posts.Content: Dear Bonnie, I had  high dose chemo-adriamyacin, taxol & cytoxin & they gave me lots of anti nausea meds & said take them even if i don't feel sick. i never got sick. most of all think positive it helps. i was stage 3 with 14 positive lymph nodes. that was  in 2002 & I'm still here. good luck Nancy
Posts.Title: Terrified of Chemo - HELP!

Posts.Content: i had high dose chemo/radiation stage 3  in 2002. thinking about reconstruction. any sugestions or recomendations? thanks nb
Posts.Title: reconstruction after chemo /radiation

Posts.Content: need info when i had radiation in 2002 at university hospitals of cleveland they made a form of plaster or fiberglass of the position i had to lay in so i wouldn't move. my siter in law is having radiation locally and they did not make a form for her to lay in. did anyone else have a form as i did or was my radiologist being extra careful? thanks for any info , n b
Posts.Title: radiation

Posts.Content: i had lt mastectomy 14 pos lymph nodes feb 2003, now have pain on left arm no swelling, is this begining of lyphodema? any exercises or therapy? still thinking abt recon dr said don't have enough fat had c sec only alternative is lattissimos flap help, nb
Posts.Title: lymphodema

Posts.Content: On 4/17/2009 mmsurvivor wrote: I AM ON THE west coast and looking to help a young 36 year old woman with breast cancer with MEts.  Which hospitals are the most understanding and compassionate. She has no insurance but is self insured so has some money..Please help doc name would be great!  Many thanks..MMS Dear MMS, I went to university Hospital of Cleveland's Ireland Cancer Center I had stage 3 invasive lobular with 14 lympth nodes positive, They were excellent. They did not give me odds said patients sometimes live up to bad new so i thought positve, I was on a clinical trial & never got sick excellant care.  that was 7 years ago, nb.
